segments.text: Hello , Pineapple Computer Company . This is Janice Shaw , the secretary of Nova . May I ask who is calling ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . This is Dan . Could I speak to Nova ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I feel so sorry that Nova has gone on her business trip .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? When will she come back ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe next weekend . She only mentioned this before she left .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the reason why I am calling is to tell her that our appointment in next month will have to be postponed . And the exact time for this meeting will be discussed after she comes back .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait a minute . I have to leave a memo here . Anything else ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The file for the meeting needs to be retyped and please send it to us as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Dan , don't worry . I will tell her everything as soon as she comes back .
segments.speaker: S1
